Abstract

This manual documents the interfaces of the libgpod library and has some short notes to help get you up to speed with using the library.

iPod database
iPod database reading/writing — Functions to create, read, write the iPod database
File handling functions — Functions to copy new files to the iPod
Time handling — Helper functions to convert between Epoch time and Mac (iPod) time
Low-level functions — Low-level functions which shouldn't be needed in normal situations
iPod database components
Tracks — Data structure to store metadata about an iPod track
Playlists — Data structure to represent an iPod playlist
Artwork — Data structure to store iPod artwork (cover and photos)
Device — Data structure holding information about the iPod (model, mount point, ...)
